message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be very happy with your purchase.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $175. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with, but I still think $175 is a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $170. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm really close to the price I'm willing to pay, and I think we're getting close to a deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $165?

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $168. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $165. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can meet there. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
